page.title: 13ROADS NEAR OUR SHOOL
page.content: We found that there was one bus on Saturday going to North Walsham from Aylsham.It costs 63p.The bus services have been cut such alot that most people have cars,or have to rely on friends and the community bus if they live in the villages .Most of the children in our school go to school on a coach.There are lots of coach firms which run buses to larger places for shopping etc. The B1145 is a very busy road near our school.Lots of people go to work at the towns.In January,it snowed so much that this road was blocked and we had a day off school. This road goes through part of Banningham,and right through Felmingham which is where lots of children from our school live.It is a long village,built along the road.
